name: Safe Haven (Citsua)
description:
The world is dying. The dead have taken over, and you survive by sneakily getting out to gather whatever food you can find. But one day, you find a small creature getting attacked by a zombie, and you decide to save it.

Now, your goal isn't just to survive anymore. You'll fight if you have to. You have to protect yourself, and your little furry friend.

NOTE

Everything in the game has been created by us for the LD46. The only exceptions are:

- human and zombie animations
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/zombie-animation-pack-free-1...
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/rpg-character-mecanim-animat...

- particle effects
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/epic-toon-fx-57772

Thank you for playing!
